title: IS_PED_USING_SCENARIO
content:
0x1BF094736DD62C2E0x0F65B0D4// IsPedUsingScenario
BOOL IS_PED_USING_SCENARIO(Ped ped, char* scenario);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.scenario: The scenario name.Returns: Returns true if the specified ped is using the specified scenario.See TASK_START_SCENARIO_IN_PLACE for a list of scenarios.
codeBlocks:
// IsPedUsingScenario
BOOL IS_PED_USING_SCENARIO(Ped ped, char* scenario);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for IS_PED_USING_SCENARIO
IsPedUsingScenario(ped, '')
